verses.roman:
punaḥ siddhavaṭa āilā sei vipra-ghare
sei vipra kṛṣṇa-nāma laya nirantare

synonyms: punaḥ—again; siddha-vaṭa—to the place known as Siddhavaṭa; āilā—returned; sei—that; vipra-ghare—in the house of the brāhmaṇa; sei vipra—that brāhmaṇa; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; laya—chants; nirantare—constantly.
translation: After visiting the temple of Trivikrama, the Lord returned to Siddhavaṭa, where He again visited the house of the brāhmaṇa, who was now constantly chanting the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra.
